description: Unique system identifier for the report category record.
Human-readable identifier or name for the report category used for selection and filtering.
Text describing the report category shown to users.
Administrative notes about the category, such as scope or usage guidance.
Timestamp when this record was most recently changed.
Boolean flag indicating whether the category is currently enabled in the application.
Flag indicating whether the category is user-defined rather than system-delivered.
User account that created this category record.
Timestamp when the category record was created.
User account that last modified this category record.
Timestamp when the category record was last modified.
